verbs.description: Tariffs [V: are] striking up conversation everywhere as a possible trade war lurks among the US , Europe , Canada , China , and Mexico . Tariffs can impact global markets and have both benefits and costs . It 's important to understand what a tariff actually is before assessing Trump 's new trade barriers .
